DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Briefly describe purpose protocol : This study design evaluate effectiveness educational training program topic health literacy Family Medicine resident . The hypothesis test train resident health literacy result improvement resident ' knowledge , skill , attitude respect health literacy . 2 . Briefly summarize participant recruit : OHSU Family Medicine Interns attend mandatory training topic health literacy throughout three year residency program invite participate study . 3 . Briefly describe procedure subject undergo : Completion short self-administered anonymous survey variety learning session topic health literacy . 4 . If applicable , briefly describe survey/interview instrument use : A 12-item pre-test questionnaire 13-item post-test questionnaire design assess individual ' knowledge health literacy , intend clinical practice respect health literacy . 5 . If clinical trial use experimental drug and/or device , approve drug and/or device use unapproved purpose , briefly describe drug and/or device : n/a 6 . Briefly describe data analyze address purpose protocol : Demographics response individual item report frequency percentage within sample . We use chi-square analysis stratify response demographic group t-tests measure possible change time
DOC.brief_title: Effects Longitudinal Health Literacy Training Program Family Medicine Residents
DOC.criteria: Family medicine resident enter summer 2011 OHSU Department Family Medicine
